title: attempting to reconect
body: Hello plz help i have attempting to reconnect every ~ 5 minutesi tried everything that i see at forums desebling iphelper google dns port forwarding in router etc. i didnt help for me

replies.body: The steps you've taken are on the right track, as this issue is likely being caused by a network problem.  I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for more specific steps.  This should help get you back in game!
nothing helped for me so plz  do something with that i have same problem ro 3 weeks
